name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y $(cat packages.txt); [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit
postCreateCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt-get install -y $(cat packages.txt) && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=/home/vscode/.cache/ms-playwright playwright install-deps && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=/home/vscode/.cache/ms-playwright playwright install chromium
postAttachCommand: PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=/home/vscode/.cache/ms-playwright playwright install chromium && streamlit run streamlit_app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
